title: 02/12/21 – Hour 1 - Steph Curry Enters The MVP Race and J.J. Watt Gets Released. Guest – Michael Lee
itunes:title: 02/12/21 – Hour 1 - Steph Curry Enters The MVP Race and J.J. Watt Gets Released. Guest – Michael Lee
description:
Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb sit in for Dan Patrick and talk about Steph Curry’s resurgence as one of the best players in the Association! They react to the Texans’ decision to release J.J. Watt and predict what will happen with Deshaun Watson. Plus, Michael Lee of The Washington Post stops by to break down the MVP race and much more around the league!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
